name: Non Game Event Postseason validation (NGE)
description: Prior to the ticket remapping from a NonGame Event

name: NGE Post Season Ticket Forwarding
description: Ticket Forwarding works for Post Season Tickets

name: NGE Post Season Checkin
description:
Fans can check into postseason NGE events types and can unlock offers
*Manual Checkin supported for NGE (if configured as part of the offer group)
*Auto Checkin NOT supported for NGE (for V1)

name: Post Season NGE remapped to Game Matchup
description: As transition occurs to Game matchup from TBD/non-game event, BP app should update/display accordingly

name: Post Season Ticket Forwarding
description: Ticket Forwarding works for Post Season Tickets

name: Post Season Checkin
description: Fans can check into events of all postseason types and can unlock offers

name: Post Season Upcoming Match-Ups
description:
Home Service provides an Upcoming Section and Card for tickets on sale
*NGE NOT SUPPORTED WITH V1

Requirements for Section/Cards shown (as of June 2021)
* location enabled (passed from BP to Home Service)
* available T-link for upcoming games (within 30 days)
* stadium location is within 60 miles of device location
* 90 mins after start time, the current day's upcoming matchup should no longer be shown AND the following upcoming matchup should be shown instead, if there is a following upcoming matchup for sale (T-Link available)
